item.description:
let's meet at the hatch shell on the esplanade and do a bit of skating.

this is a skate for all skill levels. if you're an intermediate or advanced skater, please feel free to take off ... but please rejoin us to chat as we skate along.

we'll skate for about an hour or so. after that, i'm heading over to the border cafe in harvard square for a post-skate margarita. please feel free to join me....

i'll send an email w/my cell # to all Yes and Maybe RSVPers by about 10a on sunday morning. i'll be at the hatch shell at about 12:45 and we'll take off at 1.

see you around the river!
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 9 august, 10:00a
item.name: Sunday Skate: Charles River / Hatch Shell @ 1 pm
